title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-7.4 - Signs for which permits are required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-7.4 - Signs for which permits are required

State Regulations

No person shall construct, erect, own, operate or
maintain a sign, advertising structure or device not otherwise exempt pursuant
to the provisions of section
646-7.2
(a) of this Subpart, which advertises the principal business or principal
businesses conducted on the property on which the sign is located without a
permit from the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
646-7.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
